They're BW size.

::::

Dogged's punch hits the bot's chest with a clang of silver against heavy armor, the bot not flinching. His opponent was about one third his height. He lifts his fist and swings it down, attempting to slam it into Dogged's head.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> He's a little taller than the origional Bumblebee if we're still going by
> old  Autobot and  Decepticon hight, about 5 feet if we're stuck with Beast
> wars hight. Either way he's shorter than average.
> 
> Dogged leaps up to about the hight of  "the bums" chest throwing a jab. The
> only chance he saw for victory was to punch the waste material out of his
> opponents.
